data.feedback: Well-structured architecture plan. All file paths verified - frontend repo is empty, all filesToCreate are truly new. Stories have correct dependencies, testable acceptance criteria, and detailed implementation guidance. Architecture follows modern best practices (Vite over CRA, strict TypeScript) and is consistent with backend patterns.
suggestions: Consider adding .eslintignore to epic filesToCreate list (Story 3 mentions it)
Document port configuration strategy if backend also uses 3000
